column1: Here’s an article from Newsday on my win. After press time we found out that I am up by over 30000 votes. I only won by 19000 in 2016.  The margin will continue to increase as the Boards of Elections in all three counties count today! Thanks everyone!  https://t.co/snsiuTgGe6
Press Statement from Congressman Tom Suozzi: Suozzi Wins! https://t.co/IbSBYnQzCz
Tom takes the lead! https://t.co/DTENYNFU1o
Press conference starting shortly! Watch on FB live! https://t.co/wYuJqAJ96b
5 Minutes Warning! Tom has taken the lead! Tune in to Facebook Live at 11:30 AM as Tom updates the press and his supporters on the vote count in his race. https://t.co/4fuwoL0d4e
Don't forget to tune in to my Facebook Live at 11:30 as I updates the press and my supporters on the vote count in my race. Sneak Preview: "I've taken the lead"
🚨🚨 Tom has taken the lead in his re-election campaign! Please tune in to his Facebook Live at 11:30 AM as Tom updates the press and his supporters on the vote count in his race. 🚨🚨
Tom has taken the lead in his re-election campaign! Please tune in to his Facebook Live at 11:30 AM as Tom updates the press and his supporters on the vote count in his race.

President-elect Biden has a plan to address COVID. He has convened a COVID task force of expert scientists and drs. We need to reduce the spread to save American lives. For our part we need to wear masks. As our President-elect says "small acts add up to enormous achievement."

Congratulations President-elect @JoeBiden. You are the President we need to try to bring our country together. I pray for your success and I look forward to working with you to take on the big problems our country and my constituents face. https://t.co/JLWqIc7tnB
I feel good. We will win. Be patient. It will take two weeks. That is the process and it will lead to victory!  https://t.co/Zs3ILkMZ2x
Democrats hold a 3-1 advantage in the nearly 90k absentee votes yet to be counted and we expect Tom’s margin of victory to be over 20k votes."    Kim Devlin senior advisor Suozzi for Congress

Suozzi Campaign Advisor: "We are confident of victory!"    Glen Cove NY - “As we await the final tally of all votes we are confident of Congressman Tom Suozzi’s victory. It is clear that Tom will win re-election by a substantial margin.
I feel great! Plus the overwhelming majority of absentee ballots are from registered Democrats! Let’s go!

Looking good! We are winning in Nassau Suffolk and Queens! There have been over 350000 total votes cast but the final results will take a while.  Later tonight we will have all of the Election Day votes and all of the early votes but not the absentee ballot votes.

Helene Joe and I voted in Glen Cove at the Gribbin School this morning! Caroline is working in California and voted absentee and Michael gets to vote next year! Go to https://t.co/eNM3F13CXR to find out where you vote. https://t.co/tCX0is83fn
Another great endorsement - thank you! RSVP for our GOTV Zoom Rally at: https://t.co/evnNAVodzg https://t.co/RhKIOuZSV5
Never forget the Vet! https://t.co/8jg2qT3pBN
I am happy to endorse @Ngoroff - “A Scientist with Solutions!” Here are three good reasons to support Nancy - Trump SALT and climate.
Another endorsement! The Northport Observer joins Newsday The Island Now and The Queens Courier. Thanks all! Read the full endorsement here: https://t.co/KQ60kYNQKV https://t.co/Zr5rMFEi4D
Early Vote begins on Saturday Oct 24! To find your Early Vote location please visit https://t.co/zhes1rGB3g https://t.co/summkE6sEC

Please join me tonight at 6PM for a Zoom and phone bank to help make sure Joe Biden wins Pennsylvania...a must win state to elect him our next President!   RSVP to Steven@SuozziforCongress.com to get the Zoom link. https://t.co/1SqoTwH8iZ

L'Shanah Tovah!  I want to send my best to everyone celebrating the Jewish New Year and the High Holy Days.  As it has many times throughout history this New Year finds the world in a state of turbulence. Always I hope for peace your good health and abundant blessings. https://t.co/zT41kXLjee

“From Long Island to Luzerne: Suozzi for Congress Phone Bank for Biden”  Join us on Monday at 6:30 PM for a ZOOM to launch our efforts to win Luzerne County Pennsylvania for Joe Biden!! Details in the flyer.   Register here: https://t.co/UCEIJfNdTS  #TeamJoe #BidenHarris https://t.co/2NEqTjdsmr
This Labor Day Let’s Honor the Dignity of Work  Suozzi Labor Day Message https://t.co/mvA79EVgnE via @YouTube
Joe Biden will lower the heat by bringing all sides to the same table so we can work together. That’s Joe Biden’s America.  #BidenHarris #TeamJoe
Biden also pledged his support for the many good men and women in law enforcement. He is right!   The President will continue to stoke division and play on fear. That is Donald Trump’s America.

He also made the point that “(Trump) doesn’t want to shed light he wants to generate heat and he is stoking violence in our cities....fires are burning and we have a president who fans the flames rather than fighting the flames.”
Joe said “rioting is not protesting looting is not protesting setting fires is not protesting….its lawlessness plain and simple. And those who do it should be prosecuted."
Joe Biden just gave an important speech about the violence happening in “Donald Trump’s America” today.  https://t.co/tfrFCBBPan  #BidenHarris #TeamJoe

Check out this new ad from #BidenHarris. If you agree with me that this is what America is looking for in our next President then please share! #AUnitedAmerica #TeamJoC https://t.co/EUpvgj2DeA via @YouTube

I believe in @JoeBiden his empathy his compassion his experience his integrity. I will do everything I can to help him become the next President of the United States! Let’s Go!!!  #BidenHarris #TeamJoe #DemConvention
@JoeBiden absolutely crushed it! Awesome speech!! A great speech a great man who will be the next President of the United States!! #BidenHarris #TeamJoe #DemConvention
The Boss gets it. #DemConvention #BidenHarris #TeamJoe https://t.co/oDp9OmVwkn
Kristin Urquiza who lost her father to Corinavirus “Enough is enough. President Trump did not cause Coronavirus but he made it worse.” https://t.co/K5WGeS4sM3
... Leadership Matters ... Government Matters ... Joe Biden can restore the soul of America. #DemConvention #BidenHarris #TeamJoe
Our Governor @NYGovCuomo talking about the importance of leadership to defeat the Coronavirus. “How vulnerable we are when we are divided ... American will rise to their call ... love wins ...
My colleague Majority Whip Jim Clyburn (@ClyburnSC06) talking about racial justice “We know Joe and more important Joe knows us.” #DemConvention #BidenHarris #TeamJoe
Real stories from real people throughout America. Small business teenager farmer school nurse. We are all in this together! Better days ahead! We the People!! #DemConvention #BidenHarris #TeamJoe

Great opening of night 1 of the #DemConvention. Kids from all 50 states and US territories singing the national anthem and the Biden grandchildren reciting the Pledge of Allegiance. This is America! #BidenHarris #TeamJoe
Let’s go Joe!! Please share.   #DemConvention #BidenHarris #TeamJoe   https://t.co/pWOBEb97tM

@JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris have the vision and leadership to unify the country and bring us out of these dark times and our virtual convention will highlight that. Please commit to watch each night of the convention from 9pm-11pm and check out various ways you can view below.

Hey everyone today is the first day of the Democratic Convention!! This will be unlike any convention the Democrats have had before. No huge crowds no post-nightly speeches parties no balloons and streamers or colorful signs. But the stakes are the same….even higher.

Also participating in this great event were my colleagues Speaker @TeamPelosi Congresswomen @rosadelauro and @RepBonamici Congressman @davidcicilline Mayor of Los Angeles @ericgarcetti and my good friend Secretary Leon Panetta. https://t.co/7J0PqjRsLh

Dr. Jill Giacoppa Biden will be the first Italian American First Lady of the United States of America!     This afternoon I was honored to join the Italian American Leadership Council as we honored and celebrated @DrBiden. #BidenHarris #TeamJoe https://t.co/ixfLEutT4O
New York is one of the centers of a Jewish life in America and in the world. NY electeds should learn as much about Israel as is possible.

I have visited Israel many times. Seeing and experiencing Israel firsthand helps an elected official appreciate and understand the history the strategic importance it plays in the region for security and its democratic values.
This question from @nycDSA is wrong plain and simple. https://t.co/5YtB01we7W
Thank you to my friends in the Long Island Federation of Labor (AFL-CIO) for your endorsement in my re-election! https://t.co/3LYi1g89gl
@KamalaHarris a first generation American is making history now sharing the ticket with @JoeBiden and together they will make history again in November! #BidenHarris #Biden2020 #TeamJoe

“Suozzi....said Harris is ‘on the [Senate] intelligence and judiciary committees so she knows what's going on domestically and internationally and she ran one of the largest legal operations in the world when she was the attorney general of California.’”  https://t.co/mW5k7yngfx
Congratulations to @KamalaHarris for agreeing to be on the ticket with @JoeBiden. Biden/Harris - a winning team! Taking our country back. #BidenHarris #TeamJoe https://t.co/qW8jL5REE1

...This may be the most consequential election of our lives and it is critical that we replace Donald Trump with a leader who understands the scale and urgency of the climate crisis and is ready to take bold action to solve it.” #TeamJoe

Congratulations to @JoeBiden! Today the Sierra Club endorsed him for President saying “We are confident that Joe Biden will be the champion for climate justice that America needs in the White House...

What a great PSA and message delivered by a few of Long Island’s best! County Execs @CurranNassau and @SteveBellone the NAACP’s @EdwardsTraceyA @LIFEDofLABOR's John Durso and LIA’s Kevin Law.  #MaskUpLongIsland https://t.co/eKVUtKhWSa via @YouTube
The plan is here:  https://t.co/Az94Nql1Dp

Since the 1980s the Dow has gone up 1200%. The GDP has gone up 600% but middle class wages have hardly budged.   The American Dream is no longer a reality for most. @JoeBiden has a plan to #BuildBackBetter by creating an economy which is inclusive for all.
https://t.co/yYoCHZmd1K

Everyone can take a lesson from Michael. When the primaries are over to win in November to make Joe Biden the President to take the Senate and to maintain the House we all need to unite and work together to change the direction of our country.

I thanked Michael. Congratulated him not only on a book he helped write with Dean Feerick but on his legal success in helping a Canadian journalist get released from jail. I also offered to try and be helpful to him in the future if he continues to pursue public service.
Michael Weinstock one of my primary opponents just called to congratulate me on my primary win and confirmed his support for me in November. Thanks Michael. That was very gracious.
Thank you everyone!!!  Election Night 6/23/20 https://t.co/tb9HWKMJxG
Thank you @Brady_PAC for the endorsement! I will always support common sense gun safety laws! https://t.co/Ir2sFhicEQ
Governor Andrew Cuomo endorses Congressman Tom Suozzi’s re-election! https://t.co/6OGfsYxGwW

Now we need Mitch McConnell to do his job and put the Equality Act that has passed out of the House to a vote in the Senate. I am proud to have been endorsed by the Jim Owles Democratic Club and the Stonewall Democrats. I stand with you today and every day.

Excellent landmark ruling by SCOTUS for the LGBT community and for equality for all! The Supreme Court has ruled that Americans cannot be fired because of their gender identity or sexual orientation.   https://t.co/ej6ovWH7Ar
Thank you @RWDSU for your endorsement and support! https://t.co/0Vcxm8RTub
Thank you to End Citizens United (@StopBigMoney) for the endorsement! https://t.co/CXpx39ibUE

Thank you to the League of Women Voters of Huntington who organized a virtual debate on June 8th after all other agreed upon debates were cancelled due to the coronavirus.  You can view the debate on their youtube channel on June 9th. https://t.co/5UI5Z96fP2

Voting by mail instruction video! Helene Caroline Joe and I received our mail ballots and we made a short video explaining how to vote. Please share to make sure everyone does it correctly! https://t.co/c5VmUY0maX
I'm so proud to have received a 100% on the last Human Rights Campaign Congressional Scorecard. Thank you! https://t.co/eg1L33ZLO7
The signs are in! Request your sign today and Joe Suozzi will deliver it to you!  https://t.co/jfmjXzQWLj https://t.co/HqXNrrKEVy

Thank you to the United Federation of Teachers and the New York State United Teachers for their endorsements! Teachers spend countless hours educating empowering and inspiring the leaders of tomorrow. They'll always have a strong advocate and ally in me. https://t.co/Kx1BaSJDZe
Thank you! @ASAAL08 https://t.co/rGluZcBEdF
Please share! https://t.co/H7FJV5eMSr

I heard a great saying on 60 minutes tonight from Author Bill McKibben:  It’s time to “flatten the carbon curve too.”  We have proven that when we all work together we can change things for the better. We can flatten the curve. Let’s flatten the carbon curve too! We can do it! https://t.co/nLtkA4WiXd
Stay Home Stay Safe Vote by Mail.  Please share! https://t.co/exyN38FXHl

“I’ll never stop fighting for NY.”  You may know I have a primary June 23rd. Our first commercial starts airing on TV today. Let me know what you think of the ad and please share. https://t.co/pUzko1ZtnA
Please join Tom and Helene tomorrow for our Volunteer Virtual Day of Action! RSVP to email or call Aaron’s cell https://t.co/z5FWDcIL1S

Essential workers deserve special recognition every day not just on #MayDay  Thank you for leaving your families and the safety of your homes to perform the jobs that keep us healthy safe nourished and cared for. You are our heroes. #EssentialWorkersDay #FrontlineHeroes https://t.co/k1umui35B3
Thanks to Public Employees Federation for your endorsement for my re-election. The Coronavirus pandemic has shown all of us how invaluable your work is! https://t.co/ungFSQbMLX
Zissen Pesach to all my friends celebrating this first night of Passover! https://t.co/WjHxvqB08m
Thank you to all essential workers. Stay safe! https://t.co/yYNeCR1IeZ
March is Women’s History Month! I am grateful for the strong women I have the great opportunity to work with. Thanks for all of your support and encouragement @JudiBosworth! https://t.co/Z49KyAkEib

Judi is a smart warm leader with a great sense of humor. She puts her heart in everything she does. I am happy to work with her on many initiatives that make lives better for the residents in North Hempstead.” Judi Bosworth: Women for Suozzi https://t.co/cLjesxsAkL via @YouTube
Happy #InternationalWomensDay to all of the fantastic women I know most especially the two most important women in my life Helene and Caroline. https://t.co/tgQtb1o7tn
We have come so far but still have so far to go. I remain committed to fighting for justice for all Americans. 🇺🇸 #GoodTrouble

What an experience! This weekend I traveled to Selma Alabama to participate along with my friend @repjohnlewis and other giants in the civil rights movement to commemorate the 55th anniversary of the Selma to Montgomery March. https://t.co/882KXh3HqL

@JudiBosworth is a smart warm leader with a great sense of humor. She's an even better human being who puts her heart in everything she does. I'm happy to partner with Judi on so many initiatives that make lives better for the residents in North Hempstead.” #WomenforSuozzi https://t.co/MwQMQ2zjdt
Way to go @JoeBiden! You have been through more than most could ever handle yet your heart is filled with love for America and for all people!! Run Joe Run!!!! https://t.co/loFj6afcZL

500+ women strong for the Women for Suozzi Brunch happening now at the Chateau Briand. Great speakers from @KathleenRice and @NassauExecutive to @JudiBosworth and common sense gun reform advocate @LindaSchulman had the room rockin! #womenforsuozzi #suozzi2020 https://t.co/BVSl86qU4x

Thank you to the @bradybuzz for your endorsement: “Throughout his time in Congress Rep. Suozzi has demonstrated steadfast commitment to addressing our nation’s gun violence epidemic." - Brady President Kris Brown https://t.co/3jnkyYuPuk

I am proud to receive a 100% rating from The @HumaneSociety of the United States.  It is important that we protect animals and seek to end the most egregious forms of animal cruelty and neglect. https://t.co/iliKNQOQ5m

Another A Rating!!! ____________________ I just received an A rating from the @ChildDefender  Advocating so that every child has equal opportunity and access to what they need to thrive and reach their full potential has been and will always be a priority of mine https://t.co/9vyNaGr437

Happy Martin Luther King Day! Martin Luther King is an American hero who in his much too short 39 years changed the course of human history. We need his wisdom and example today more than ever. https://t.co/MbeUvWU2GA
